step.cmd: Select the exploded representation in the Mechanical Browser.
Right-click the exploded representation and select Edit from the context menu.

div.note: As an alternative, you can execute command Bedit and select the block with the exploded representation.

step.cmd: Perform the necessary operations to get the desired exploded representation.
Save changes using command Bclose with the option Save.

postreq.note: Do not use the Discard option of command Bclose, as it can lead to an inconsistent state of the block and exploded representation steps. Use Undo instead.
